column4: The other day someone sent me to an ubuntulinux.org page that not only showed how to install the ndiswrapper, but how to save the settings for it.  Can anyone refer me to that url?
one of the ubuntu pages had a whole writeup on it
but it's *not* the ndiswrapper howto, that just says how to install it
sometimes i even have to rmmod ndiswrapper, modprobe ndiswrapper before it works
yeah, and I know the answer is on the ubunti site, I just can't find the page :D
